channel.title: Power+ - 317 Server Development
channel.description:
[CENTER]I restarted this project due to a massive bug witch i did not feel like solving, so i made a new base, again. THIS time it will not get bugged as i will not let it, as it is, its more stable and has more features then the original barebones base. It uses hashmaps hashtables, sql ect, i made this from a blank source that i made a while back (about 1 week lol)
[U][B]Current features:[/B][/U]
Login Player Rendering Walking Equipment Bonuses Item droping Item picking up Item equiping Item removing Starter items NPC Spawning Fixed animations Shops Infinate Running NPC Dialouge Levelup interfaces Teleports NPC Combat NPC Facing Firemaking Woodcutting logout
[U][B]Pictures:[/B][/U]
Dropping items
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/of92z5.jpg[/img]
Picking up items
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/24azosy.jpg[/img]
Item bonuses + Equiping
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/2uygexi.jpg[/img]
Unequiping
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/8weflt.jpg[/img]
Starter
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/14m5gfs.jpg[/img]
npcs [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/353dz11.jpg[/img]
NPC Dialouge
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/i36t5x.jpg[/img]
Shops
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/102tout.jpg[/img]
Levelup interfaces
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/ip1r8o.jpg[/img]
NPC Combat ( Melee )
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/9b90es.jpg[/img]
NPC Facing
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/jpx17a.jpg[/img]
Firemaking [Warning big image (3.9mb)] [URL=http://i39.tinypic.com/2i9tslx.gif]http://i39.tinypic.com/2i9tslx.gif[/URL]
Woodcutting [url=http://i44.tinypic.com/nog553.gif]http://i44.tinypic.com/nog553.gif[/url]
[More to come]
[B][U]Support
[/U][/B]To support, just put this thread link into your signitures and/or post on this topic :)
Suggestions and comments are appreciated [/CENTER]

[CENTER]I restarted this project due to a massive bug witch i did not feel like solving, so i made a new base, again. THIS time it will not get bugged as i will not let it, as it is, its more stable and has more features then the original barebones base.
